fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to prevent all visits to a player of your choice and learn the names and roles of all players whose visits you prevented this way.
- Use 2 bees to Unstoppably poison someone.
- Use 3 bees to make all effects that would happen to any one of up to three players of your choice happen to all three of those players instead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.
- With the Necronomicon, you earn an additional bee each night.
